page.title: 20Education in Orwell Parish
page.content: Most children who live here attend either{Milnathort Primary School}or {Kinross High School (block 03080702). Part of Kinross Primary School's catchment area is also in this block. The local schools use the environ- ment for field studies as there are many places within easy reach, even if walking. Burleigh Castle is an example The High School also uses parts of {Kinross Estate's}land during cross- country running. A dozen or so children travel daily to{Dollar Academy, Dollar.}Some others attend fee-paying schools at Perth or Bridge of Earn. Some local people, teenagers and older, study at colleges of further education in Perth or Dunfermline.
